programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Shocked by her task, Daya tries her best to prevent herself from dancing. However, she fails to do so and begins to do 'garba'.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya panics when she hears that Sundarlal has gone missing. Soon, she tells Nattu Kaka to get her tickets to Ahmedabad.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal tries to find Sundarlal by calling his friends. However, Sundarlal seems to have vanished without a trace.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya finds Sundarlal at the airport and takes him home. However, Sundarlal tells Daya and Anjali not to let anyone know he has arrived at the society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is conflicted when Jethalal forces her to choose between himself and Sundarlal. Later, Daya enlists Tapu's help to sneak Sundarlal around.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya is nervous about Jethalal finding Sundarlal hidden in their house. Later, Jethalal becomes suspicious when Daya is eager for him to leave.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal catches a peek of Sundarlal in his kitchen and assumes it is a burglar. Soon, the rest of Gokuldham Society panics and begins searching for the supposed criminal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Zorawar is on the lookout for Sundarlal and hunts all over the society. However, Sundarlal dresses up as a housemaid to evade capture.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sundarlal dresses up as a woman to disguise himself. However, chaos ensues when the other residents assume Sundarlal is Popatlal's girlfriend.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Holi celebrations continue in full swing. Meanwhile, Zorawar and his men hunt for Sundarlal all over Gokuldham Society.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Champaklal's feet hurt, Jethalal and Tapu fight over helping him. Later, Jethalal feels embarrassed in front of Babita.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal's phone stops functioning and he tries various techniques to fix the problem. Later, he decides to purchase a smartphone from Jethalal's store.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal is keen on buying his new phone as per the auspicious time given by the priest. At the shop, he harasses Jethalal a lot over selecting the phone.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Dr Salunkhe manages to save Daya's life by performing an emergency medical procedure. Later, the CID team finds a dead body inside the vault and discover an entrance to a long tunnel.

programme.title: CID
programme.desc: Sanjana is asked to surrender the mysterious briefcase because of which she was kidnapped. Meanwhile, Daya manages to save Abhijeet in the nick of time.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: A dejected Jethalal plans to take his family to Lonavala when Babita does not invite him to her birthday party. But when Babita learns the truth she confronts Iyer about the error.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya excitedly rush to get the perfect gift for Babita's birthday party. On the other hand, Babita and Iyer's grand party begins in full swing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Daya reach right on time for Babita's bash and learn that they failed to get the perfect gift for her. Later, Champaklal attends the party and feels horrified to find Daya in a dress.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is happy to finally be out of jail and have his name cleared in the gold case. Later, he visits each of his friends to thank them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide is unable to come up with a thoughtful quote to write on the public chalkboard. Later, Champaklal comes by and suggests a great thought for him to use.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha interrupts Jethalal in his signature way as he enjoys his cup of tea in the morning. Just then, Bawri rushes into the shop to talk to him about an important matter.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal learns that Jethalal wants to go to Sanghvi's birthday party and scolds him for desiring to leave his family to stay out late at night.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal humiliates Jethalal in public for coming home late. Later, Jethalal begins to resent him for overreacting to a small mistake.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
programme.desc: Comedian Kapil Sharma interacts with celebrity guests about their latest films while keeping the audience laughing with his wit, humour and assorted skits.

programme.title: The Kapil Sharma Show
programme.desc: Host Kapil Sharma invites two of the most celebrated female actresses of the 20th century, Moushumi Chatterjee and Reena Roy, to enjoy a fun-filled banter with his comic troupes.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal learns that Champaklal took his money from the shop just before he has to pay a dealer. The police arrest Champaklal when they mistake him for a thief.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal and Taarak are surprised to learn that Champaklal has disappeared. Tapu explains the circumstances around him going missing.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone in Gokuldham is surprised to learn that Champaklal has been arrested. The members rush to the police station to free him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal asks Taarak for help finding work after losing his job. Sodhi agrees to employ Popatlal in his auto garage.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal approaches Taarak and seeks his help to get a job. He finds himself in hot water after insulting Taarak's boss.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bagha's idea of Popatlal filling in for Nattu Kaka is rejected by Jethalal, leading Popatlal to pursue alternative job opportunities.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Popatlal proposes a business partnership to Madhavi and subsequently starts delivering pickles and various snacks on her behalf.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu and his friends propose a trip for the Christmas break, but their parents flatly reject the idea.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu and friends feel bored during Christmas break with no plans. Anjali presents a big idea to make their vacation exciting and unforgettable.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Everyone in Gokuldham organises a surprise Christmas party while Tapu and Anjali are out. Upon returning, the children are excited to find Santa Claus waiting for them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Tapu Sena and Anjali narrate their experience celebrating Christmas with the children at Punarvas Education Society. Jethalal receives an invitation to a big New Year's Eve party.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Gokuldham's men decide to celebrate New Year's Eve together in a grand hotel without their families. When they share their plan with their wives, they receive mixed reactions.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: While Jethalal plans to take his friends with him for a grand New Year's Eve party, Sunder visits the Gada family. The enraged ladies scold Jethalal for not inviting them.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When Sunder learns that the men want to celebrate New Year's Eve separately, he promises the ladies a grand party. He eventually visits Jethalal at his shop to ruin his plans.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society enjoy an extraordinary New Year's Eve party together. The men collectively await their turn to enjoy alcohol served in the presence of their wives.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: At the end of the New Year's Eve party, Jethalal anxiously waits to be chosen as Babita's dance partner, but Taarak continues to build suspense.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal is thrilled as he finally has a chance to be Babita's dance partner. The men of Gokuldham await their alcohol as promised by the ladies.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Early in the morning, Jethalal has to endure Sundar at the breakfast table. To add to his woes, Sundar's group of friends arrive unexpectedly. A starving Jethalal wonders what else lies ahead for him.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Sundar tries to convince Jethalal to buy a plot from his friend. Sundar, Tapu and his friends go to the beach and have a great time. Jetha accidentally gets locked inside his own storeroom.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal accidentally drops his phone into the toilet. He is horrified to realise that he has been locked in the storeroom. Daya begins to worry about Jethalal.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Daya learns from Natu Kaka that Jethalal has left for the airport. Just as Jethalal begins to curse his luck, two thieves break into his storeroom.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The thieves threaten to harm Jethalal unless he helps them steal. Fortunately, cops arrive in time and nab the culprits. Jethalal's luck runs out when the cops mistake him for a thief.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The Gadas meet Pandeyji to seek his help. Jethalal convinces the cop to call his family.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Champaklal, Daya, Sundar and Tapu spot the thieves stealing from Jethalal's storeroom. They use their ingenuity to nab the culprits.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: When they hear about Jethalal's ordeal, all members complain to Daya as to why she did not inform them. Jethalal is angered on seeing Sundar's friends and asks who answered the phone earlier.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Bhide visits Jethalal's house with a gift to reward Champaklal, Daya, Tapu, and Sundar for their bravery. Later, Tapu, Jethalal, and Daya try to close Bhide's umbrella.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: Jethalal wants to give Babita a lift in his umbrella when he sees her standing without an umbrella. Popatlal scolds Bhide after he sees Bhide keeps his broken umbrella near the gate.

programme.title: Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah
programme.desc: The members of Gokuldham Society welcome New Year's Day with a cheerful spirit. Popatlal wreaks havoc in Gokuldham Society and walks out of his house covered in lather.

programme.title: Mere Sai - Shraddha Aur Saburi
programme.desc: As Purna and Digamber get into an argument, Mohan plays peacemaker between them. Later, Sai prays to a stone in Shirdi and explains the motive behind it to the locals.

programme.title: Mere Sai - Shraddha Aur Saburi
